LanguageData.Ammo_145x114mm_FMJ.label: 14.5x114mm 탄약 (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_145x114mm_FMJ.description: Old-school anti-tank 탄약 originally designed for AT 소총s, it is also used by a number of heavy machine guns.
